name: acceptance-testing
description: Use for verifying business requirements with executable specifications using BDD frameworks. Covers Cucumber (Java, JS, Ruby), SpecFlow/Reqnroll (C#), Behave (Python), Gauge (ThoughtWorks), and Godog (Go). Includes Gherkin feature files, step definitions, BDD workflow, and cross-language examples.
author: Tyler-R-Kendrick
